description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Distortion King is a music game that is optimized for the Guitar controller, with the added option to use the standard controller. The music ranges from hard rock to heavy metal, with the options of three difficulty settings: easy, medium, and hard. This game is ideal for anyone wanting to challenge their music skills and rock to awesome music!
